TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ModuleHandle extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Represents a runtime handle for a module.

span.span: Represents a runtime handle for a module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die , , und Methoden bieten eine effiziente problemlösung von Metadatentoken auf Laufzeithandles für Felder, Methoden und Typen im aktuellen Modul.The , , and methods provide efficient resolution of metadata tokens to runtime handles for fields, methods, and types in the current module.

Public ReadOnly Property MDStreamVersion As Integer

summary.span: Gets the metadata stream version.

span.span: Gets the metadata stream version.
A 32-bit integer representing the metadata stream version.

value.span: Die beiden höherwertigen Bytes stellen die Hauptversionsnummer dar und die beiden niederwertigen Bytes dar, die Nebenversionsnummer.

span.span: The high-order two bytes represent the major version number, and the low-order two bytes represent the minor version number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Auflösen ein Metadatentoken, das ein Feld identifiziert, dessen übergeordnetes Element `TypeSpec` hat eine Signatur mit Elementtyp `var` oder `mvar`, verwenden Sie die methodenüberladung, die Ihnen ermöglicht, den erforderlichen Kontext bereitzustellen.To resolve a metadata token that identifies a field whose parent `TypeSpec` has a signature containing element type `var` or `mvar`, use the method overload, which allows you to supply the necessary context. > [!NOTE] > Informationen zum Metadatentoken finden Sie in der Dokumentation der Common Language Infrastructure (CLI), insbesondere in "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics".Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". Die Dokumentation ist online verfügbar. Sie finden sie unter [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards (Standards von ECMA C# und Common Language Infrastructure)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) auf MSDN und [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) (Standard ECMA-335 – Common Language Infrastructure (CLI))](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) auf der Ecma International-Website.The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

exception.span: is not a valid token in the scope of the current module.

span.span: is not a valid token in the scope of the current module.

exception.span: -or- is not a token for a field in the scope of the current module.

span.span: -or- is not a token for a field in the scope of the current module.

exception.span: -or- identifies a field whose parent has a signature containing element type or .

span.span: -or- identifies a field whose parent has a signature containing element type or .

exception.span: The method is called on an empty field handle.

span.span: The method is called on an empty field handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ein Metadatentoken für auflösen eine `MethodSpec` dessen Signatur den Elementtyp enthält `var` oder `mvar`, verwenden Sie die methodenüberladung, die Ihnen ermöglicht, den erforderlichen Kontext bereitzustellen.To resolve a metadata token for a `MethodSpec` whose signature contains element type `var` or `mvar`, use the method overload, which allows you to supply the necessary context. > [!NOTE] > Informationen zum Metadatentoken finden Sie in der Dokumentation der Common Language Infrastructure (CLI), insbesondere in "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics".Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics".
